Sorcerer - Class in enemy
Class representing a sorcerer square in the game board A sorcerer is defined by those informations : name : life level : attack strength : A sorcerer can have actions such as : interaction display informations takes a hit gives a hit
Sorcerer() - Constructor for class enemy.Sorcerer
Customized sorcerer constructor.
Spell - Class in tool
Class representing spell, only for Wizard.
Spell() - Constructor for class tool.Spell
 
Spell(String, int) - Constructor for class tool.Spell
 
square - package square
Square classes are used to defined the component of the game board.
Square - Class in square
Class representing square of the game board A square is defined by this information : name : A square can have actions such as : interaction display informations
Square() - Constructor for class square.Square
Default square constructor.
Square(String) - Constructor for class square.Square
Name customized square constructor.
StandardPotion - Class in tool
Class representing default potion.
StandardPotion() - Constructor for class tool.StandardPotion
 
startGame() - Method in class play.Game
 
Surprise - Class in square
Class representing surprise of the game board An surprise is defined by those informations : name : A surprise can have actions such as : interaction display square informations get equipped with defense tool get equipped with attack tool
Surprise() - Constructor for class square.Surprise
Default surprise constructor.
Surprise(String) - Constructor for class square.Surprise
Name customized square constructor.
Sword - Class in tool
